__TOC__

== New Members ==

=== IRC ===

* join #ubuntu-lococouncil on Freenode
* contact another member to give you the appropriate flags (the manager template with ChanServ)
* also make sure to add `+I $a:`''your-nickserv-account'' to the channel mode so you can get back in when e.g. netsplits happen
* if you want logs, you'll have to ask a senior member for their logs

=== Mailing List ===

* join the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/loco-council|mailing list]]</nowiki>
* feel free to join in on moderation/administration; ask a senior member for more info

=== Blog ===

* ask a senior member to add you to our <nowiki>[[http://lococouncil.ubuntu.com/|blog]]</nowiki>, which is syndicated to Planet Ubuntu

=== Wiki ===

* subscribe to the <nowiki>[[LoCoCouncil-Agenda]]</nowiki> page so you can get updates on any applications

=== TODO ===

* ask a senior member to join our <nowiki>[[https://trello.com/b/JRZFAXeG/loco-council|Trello board]]</nowiki>

== Regular Business ==

=== Meetings ===

* someone should be designated as the chair and interact with <nowiki>[[meetingology]]</nowiki>
* update <nowiki>[[LoCoCouncil-Minutes]]</nowiki> when completed
* make sure to update <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~locoteams-verified|~locoteams-verified]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~locoteams|~locoteams]]</nowiki> on Launchpad as needed
* edit <nowiki>[[LoCoCouncil-Agenda]]</nowiki> to remove completed applicants and show the new date/time
* consider a blog about anything newsworthy!

=== General Maintenance ===

* watch for <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/loco-council/verified/|expirations]]</nowiki> and try to encourage !LoCo teams ahead of time
